description: nova-ajax-console-proxy crashes on shutdown, due to a NameError: name 'self' is not defined.
title: nova-ajax-console-proxy crashes on shutdown

commit 826888de038d5ba58c133c5fa1471ec9bfe0f52d
Author: Ewan Mellor <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Oct 31 17:33:47 2011 -0700

    Bug #884534: nova-ajax-console-proxy crashes on shutdown
    
    Close the correct connection, when shutting down.  self is not defined in
    this context.

commit 9a00aea7fc49522ab8628383e8a3fde3f0aa83db
Author: Ewan Mellor <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Oct 31 17:33:47 2011 -0700

    Bug #884534: nova-ajax-console-proxy crashes on shutdown
    
    Close the correct connection, when shutting down.  self is not defined in
    this context.
    
    (cherry picked from commit 826888de038d5ba58c133c5fa1471ec9bfe0f52d)
    
    Change-Id: I0dc84a1c7de468a381f5765ccba589acbc8173dd

comments.content:
Hello Ewan, or anyone else affected,

Accepted nova into oneiric-proposed, the package will build now and be available in a few hours. Please test and give feedback here. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/EnableProposed for documentation how to enable and use -proposed. Thank you in advance!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pitti
